house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1934 has 10 bedroom(s), 7 bath(s) , 2 car detached garage and approximately 7328 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, air conditioning, french doors, satellite dish.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Balcony, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, FrenchDoors, Kitchen Island, Outdoor Lights, Satellite Dish, TrashCompacter, Walk-In Closet(s)
